text: Radiolabeling of cells with [ 35 S ] - cys / met promix , immunoprecipitation and immunoblotting was done as described earlier [ 8 ] . Data obtained is representative of at least 3 independent sets of experiments conducted . Results were quantified using the NIH Image V : 1 . 32 program , normalized values calculated and graphs plotted wherever indicated . All the inhibitors were added during starvation period and maintained throughout the labeling period .
